    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shrink Down](/Feats.aspx?ID=2905) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Eidolon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=386" />
<trait label="Evolution" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=394" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 69 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

Your eidolon can shrink to fit into small spaces. Your eidolon reduces in size, to a minimum of size Small. It can use this action again while shrunk to return to its normal size. Its [reach](/Rules.aspx?ID=2379) becomes 5 feet, or 10 feet if shrinking to Large with [Towering Size](/Feats.aspx?ID=2932).

<title level="2">Shrink Down leads to...</title>
[Miniaturize](/Feats.aspx?ID=2921)
name: Shrink Down
